title: Tech News: Questions For Facebook, No More Answers from Yahoo
itunes:title: Tech News: Questions For Facebook, No More Answers from Yahoo
description:
What's going on with the Facebook data breach that saw personal data from half a billion accounts compromised? Why are Signal app users upset? And why oh why is Yahoo Answers going away?
